name: Power & Politics: A Global History of Food
base_name: Power & Politics: A Global History of Food
long_desc: The course will investigate the history of food from prehistory to the present day, and will consider examples from every corner of the world. We will begin with the science of food and taste, consider origins of agriculture and industry, and the implications of society and culture.

custom_fields.goals: Students will obtain an understanding of the complexity behind food history. Often, foodseems like a really fun subject with the opportunity to taste exciting cuisines and it will be,but we students will also come to fully reckon with practices of enslavement, famine, drought,food deserts, food insecurity, and malnutrituion.
custom_fields.key_topics:
The course will investigate the history of food from prehistory to the present day, and will
consider examples from every corner of the world. We will begin with the science of food and
taste, consider origins of agriculture and industry, and the implications of society and culture.
custom_fields.assessment_structure:
There will be a fair amount of reading, three 60-minute in-class exams, and three creative
assignments.
custom_fields.relevance:
Students will understand the politics behind food and food production. With examples from
communities and societies around the global, students will recognize some practices, habits,
and cusines, while others will be new to them. Overall, the idea behind this course it to
demonstrate how interconnected we are as peoples
custom_fields.learning_resources: Students will be provided access to any required reading materials on Canvas.
